feed.title: BigBlueButton Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.8
entry.content:
This iteration of BigBlueButton 2.7 contains a couple of security patches. Several client fixes and dependency updates were also included.

Important: We removed support for POST requests on join endpoint and also Content-Type headers are now required

In BigBlueButton 2.6.18/2.7.8 POST requests are no longer allowed for the join endpoint. To ensure they are validated properly, a Content-Type header must also be provided for POST requests that contain data in the request body. Endpoints now support a limited set of content types that includes text/xml, application/xml, application/x-www-form-url-encoded, and multipart/form-data. By default each endpoint only supports application/x-www-form-urlencoded and multipart/form-data, but individual endpoints can override this and define their own set of supported content types. The create endpoint supports all of the four previously listed content types while insertDocument supports only text/xml and application/xml. Any requests with a content type that differs from the set supported by the target endpoint will be rejected with a new unsupportedContentType error.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

  • fix(whiteboard): Inconsistent Zoom Between Live Session And Recording by @KDSBrowne in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20222
  • fix(whiteboard): Disable Duplication Shortcut Key While Drawing by @KDSBrowne in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20216
  • Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language eu by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20177

Core

  • fix(sec): fix(sec): API fix duplicates GHSA-4m48-49h7-f3c4 by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/commit/ea6e9461dceae8fa593543d8c686f77bb8677e72 security advisory will be published not earlier than May 31, 2024 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/security/advisories/GHSA-4m48-49h7-f3c4
  • refactor(bbb-web): Add message key to insertDocument responses by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20213

build

  • build(sec): set permissions for resque files [2.7] by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/commit/04e916798b6b1f53f88513df3168f009b57b8f18 security advisory will be published not earlier than May 31, 2024 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/security/advisories/GHSA-5966-9hw8-q96q

record-and-playback

  • [Snyk] Fix for 1 vulnerabilities by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20042

test/chore

  • test: [Snyk] Security upgrade jest from 27.5.1 to 29.0.0 by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20246

Docs

  • docs: drop plugin @cmfcmf/docusaurus-search-local by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20226

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.7.7...v2.7.8

Release name

Passing -v focal-270 to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/v2.7.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.7 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-270-2.7.8.

We still recommend using -v focal-270 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.7 release.

Client build: 284

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.9
entry.content:
This iteration of BigBlueButton 2.7 contains a new meeting parameter allowPromoteGuestToModerator - thanks Dennis and Timo from University of Osnabrück! Several core fixes and dependency updates were also included.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

locales * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language fr by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20327 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20385 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language uk_UA by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20369 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ca by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20363 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language it_IT by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20358 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language fa_IR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20373 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language gl by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20381 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language et by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20391 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language fi by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20412 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language es_ES by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20423 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ru by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20468

Core

  • fix: only allow POST for insertDocument in UrlMappings.groovy [2.7] by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20432
  • fix(API): Allow additional parameters in content type headers by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20396
  • feat (backport 2.7): Introduces allowPromoteGuestToModerator config by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20405

build

  • build(fix): File permissions in packages should not depend on umask of build system by @schrd in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20347

record-and-playback

  • fix(recording): Add participants, raw size, and playback size information to video metadata by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20420
  • [Snyk] Security upgrade rubocop from 1.31.2 to 1.32.0 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20296

learning analytics dashboard

  • chore: npm audit fix for learning dashboard by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20515

Docs

  • docs: Make clear in docs that parameters are case sensitive. by @ffdixon in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20276
  • docs: Various fixes by @MBM1607 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20332
  • docs: adjust correct default value for breakouts being recorded by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20372
  • docs(GL): correct statements about presentations not being migrated and how to fix entity too large errors by @danimo in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20546
  • docs: Clarify that allowPromoteGuestToModerator is a CREATE parameter by @antobinary in #20559

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.7.8...v2.7.9

Release name

Passing -v focal-270 to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/v2.7.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.7 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-270-2.7.9.

We still recommend using -v focal-270 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.7 release.

Client build: 297

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.10
entry.content:
This iteration of BigBlueButton 2.7 introduces multiple new features! We have made it possble to pass a different presentation to each breakout room. You can now ban certain users from posting to the public chat. A custom webcam background can be passed to users in the join request. Administrators can opt out of allowing breakout rooms to provide the option of uploading presentation files. Several fixes and dependency updates were also included.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

fixes * fix: Layout VIDEO_FOCUS shows empty tiles for other participants when see other viewers is locked by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20639 * fix: Manage Layouts ignores disabledFeatures by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20670 * fix: Breakouts calculation for valid users incorrect by @Scroody in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20673 * fix: external video can be seen through sidebar on mobile by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20669 * fix: Emoji animations are not being turned off by using the slider in settings. by @Scroody in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20684 * fix: [2.7] Breakout room invitation option missing from user dropdown by @Scroody in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20691 * build(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 5 directories with 6 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20771 * fix: Breakouts - do not allow slide/presentation change on breakout update by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20764 * feat(config): introduce allowPresentationManagementInBreakouts to be able to block breakouts pres uploads by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20769 * fix(webcam): client failing to apply virtual background effect by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20777

locales * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language fr by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20694 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language es by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20704 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language el_GR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20719 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20762 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ar by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20721 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20761

Core

  • chore(core): Update grails-plugin-databinding by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20768
  • chore(core): upgrade embedded tomcat by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20767
  • feat(events): Add user custom data to events.xml by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20566
  • fix: Enable download of the presentation not possible for temporarily presenters by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20641
  • feat(bbb-html5): Ban specific users from the public chat by @danielpetri1 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20585
  • fix(bbb-web and html5): removed .odi and .odc file-type supports (back-port) by @GuiLeme in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20738
  • feat: Pass a different presentation to each breakout by @danielpetri1 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20734
  • feat: Accept custom webcamBackgroundURL by @danielpetri1 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20703

learning analytics dashboard

  • build(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 5 directories with 6 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20771
  • build(deps-dev): bump postcss from 8.4.32 to 8.4.33 in /bbb-learning-dashboard in the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20772
  • build(deps-dev): bump postcss from 8.4.33 to 8.4.34 in /bbb-learning-dashboard in the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory #20773

Docs

  • docs: 2.7.10 features breakouts with own pres; ban posts from user by @antobinary in #20774

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.7.9...v2.7.10

Release name

Passing -v focal-270 to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/v2.7.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.7 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-270-2.7.10.

We still recommend using -v focal-270 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.7 release.

Client build: 318

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.11
entry.content:
This iteration of BigBlueButton 2.7 contains a patch for an issue introduced in 2.7.10 - dial in users not appearing in the session. Some polishing for the webcam backgrounds is also included.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

fixes * fix: Dial-In participants are not visible in the participants by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20799 * enhancement(webcam): custom virtual backgrounds by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20788

locales * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language it_IT by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20790 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language fa_IR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20792 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language eu by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20791

bbb-export-annotations

  • refactor: enable warn logs; add a warning when we are skipping an ann… by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20786

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.7.10...v2.7.11

Release name

Passing -v focal-270 to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/v2.7.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.7 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-270-2.7.11.

We still recommend using -v focal-270 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.7 release.

Client build: 323

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.12
entry.content:
This iteration of BigBlueButton 2.7 contains a fix to sharing webcam as content. Several behind-the-scenes improvements related to media, accessibility and exporting annotations are included.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

fixes * fix: Improve screen reader accessibility for polling modal by @KDSBrowne in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20798 * fix(audio): transparent listen only state inconsistencies, build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.14.0 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20752 * fix(video): camera cannot be shared as content by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20832 * fix(presentation): presentation snapshot overflowing the slide [2.7] by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20831 * fix(video): webcam fails to be loaded on preview when changing profiles by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20849 * fix: Ensure size estimate is applied to text shapes while typing by @KDSBrowne in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20809

locales * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language fa_IR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20808 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ar by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20827 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language et by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20865 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language tr by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20854

build and configuration

  • build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.14.1 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20829

docs

  • docs: remove extra entry for webcamBackgroundURL by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20838
  • docs: fix name of errorRedirectUrl in api docs by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20839

bbb-export-annotations

  • fix(bbb-export-annotations): Handle text rendering issue by @danielpetri1 in #20857

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.7.11...v2.7.12

Release name

Passing -v focal-270 to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/v2.7.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.7 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-270-2.7.12.

We still recommend using -v focal-270 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.7 release.

Client build: 331
